welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ankofa, Madagascar! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and friendly locals that make this city truly charming. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Ankofa has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maroantsetra Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maroantsetra Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Maroantsetra Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
